queries.name: Q2 ORDER BY device.name
queries.comment: parameters were obtained with: MATCH (device:Device) WHERE NOT (device:Model) UNWIND device.latest AS l WITH l, count(device) AS c WHERE c > 10000 RETURN l, c

queries.name: Q2 ORDER BY network.drniId
queries.comment: parameters were obtained with: MATCH (device:Device) WHERE NOT (device:Model) UNWIND device.latest AS l WITH l, count(device) AS c WHERE c > 10000 RETURN l, c

queries.name: Q2 ORDER BY network2.drniId
queries.comment: parameters were obtained with: MATCH (device:Device) WHERE NOT (device:Model) UNWIND device.latest AS l WITH l, count(device) AS c WHERE c > 10000 RETURN l, c

queries.name: Q3
queries.description: Similar to Q2, but instead of retrieving 100 sorted results, this counts the amount of rows.

queries.name: Q4
queries.description: Similar to Q2, but someone clicked the button to see almost the last page
queries.comment: parameters were obtained with: MATCH (port:PhysicalPort) WHERE NOT (port:Model) UNWIND port.latest AS l WITH l, count(port) AS c WHERE c > 100000 RETURN l, c
